completeDrillPath.pathDescription: Complete L1→L2→L3→L4 drill path demonstrating faceted identity inheritance and business granularity progression for AI-powered design automation
completeDrillPath.intersectionEvolution: Primary/Secondary/Tertiary UNSPSC class intersection with increasing business specificity

hierarchicalProgression.title: AI Software Development Foundation
hierarchicalProgression.businessScope: Universal AI software development domain with broad applicability
hierarchicalProgression.nextLevelRefinement: Market-specific focus with tertiary class addition

hierarchicalProgression.title: AI-Powered Design Tools Market
hierarchicalProgression.businessScope: AI design tools market with graphics software specialization
hierarchicalProgression.parentInheritance: Inherits L1 foundation and adds tertiary graphics class
hierarchicalProgression.nextLevelRefinement: Implementation strategies and vendor ecosystem analysis

hierarchicalProgression.title: AI Design Tool Implementation Intelligence
hierarchicalProgression.businessScope: Vendor ecosystem analysis and deployment strategies
hierarchicalProgression.parentInheritance: Inherits L2 market intersection and adds implementation specificity
hierarchicalProgression.nextLevelRefinement: Patent landscape and business granularity analysis

hierarchicalProgression.title: AI Design Patent Landscape Analysis
hierarchicalProgression.businessScope: Patent violation detection and IP risk assessment
hierarchicalProgression.parentInheritance: Inherits L3 implementation intelligence and adds patent analysis
hierarchicalProgression.businessGranularity: Maximum granularity with automated violation detection

hierarchicalNavigation.topDownQuery: Start with L1 foundation for broad context, drill down through L2 market, L3 implementation, to L4 business granularity
hierarchicalNavigation.bottomUpQuery: Start with L4 specific business need, trace up through L3 implementation, L2 market, to L1 foundation context
hierarchicalNavigation.lateralQuery: Query across same level for comparative analysis and alternative pathways

facetedSearchCapabilities.primaryClassSearch: Search across all levels by primary UNSPSC class 43232000 (Computer software)

facetedSearchCapabilities.tertiaryClassSearch: Search across L2+ levels by tertiary UNSPSC class 43234000 (Graphics software)

businessRoleFiltering.roleInheritance: Understand how role-based intelligence evolves from L1 foundation through L4 granularity
